_comment: Owlette Configuration - Edit this file to add processes to monitor

logging._max_age_comment: Automatically delete log files older than this many days

firebase_shipping._comment: Ship logs to Firebase for centralized monitoring (requires Firebase enabled)
firebase_shipping._ship_errors_only_comment: If true, only ERROR and CRITICAL logs are shipped to Firebase

firebase._comment: Cloud features: remote control, web dashboard, metrics (OPTIONAL - works great without it!)
